speed_limits.notes: Motorway limit drops to 110 km/h in rain. Rural roads often 80 km/h (reduced from 90).

alcohol_limit.notes: 0.02% for bus drivers/new drivers. Self-test breathalyzer kit recommended but fine dropped.

rules.child_seat_rules: Children <10 years must be in rear seats with appropriate restraint.
rules.phone_usage_rules: Handheld prohibited. Headsets/earphones also illegal while driving.
rules.headlights_rules: Must carry spare bulbs. Use in poor visibility.
